channel.title: GamesWorkshop on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in GamesWorkshop on Peter's Notebook

item.title: Spearhead
item.description: Issue 01; grey seer, warlock engineer, crow-dog, some-guy with a burning stick Issue 02; three really big rats with attachments Issue 03; five guys Issue 04; black and gold (paint) and that brush everyone gets mad about Issue 05; the extra special guy … gal? Issue 06; blue and hide (paint) I’m going to try doing this again … but … with less details. Paint Retributor Armour - Issue 04 Abadon Black - Issue 04 Kantor Blue - Issue 06 Rhinox Hide - Issue 06 Magazines Issue 01; grey seer, warlock engineer, crow-dog, some-guy with a burning stick Magazine 2026-03-14 Issue 02; three really big rats with attachments Magazine 2026-03-18 Issue 03; five guys Magazine 2026-03-25 Issue 04; black and gold (paint) and that brush everyone gets mad about the brush does have … like-no belly … so …

item.title: Stormbringer
item.description:
Round … 4?
Issue 01 - Stab Grot, a Knight-Arcanum and Killaboss Issue 02 - Gutrippaz Issue 03 - 5x Vindictors Issue 04 - Paints Issue 05 - Praetor Hero Issue 06 - Hobgrotz Slittaz Issue 07 - Paint Issue 08 - Lord-Imperatant and Gryph Hound with STC Medium Base Brush Issue 09 - Pot Grot and Swampcalla Shaman Issue 10 - Xandire’s Truthseekers Issue 11 - Beast-Skewer Killbow Issue 12 - Stormstrike Chariot Issue 13 - Paints Issue 14 - Man-Skewer Boltboyz Issue 15 - Stormcast Praetors Issue 16 - Primal Lair Issue 17 - Paint Issue 18 - Da Kunnin' Krew Issue 19 - Gardus Steel Soul Issue 20 - Marshcrawler Sloggoth (part 1 of 2) Issue 21 - Marshcrawler Sloggoth (part 2 of 2) Issue 22 - Paints Issue 23 - Lord-Aquilor Issue 24 - Loonboss Issue 25 - Azyrite Shattered Plaza (fountain frame only) Issue 26 - Paints Issue 27 - 6 Gryph Hounds Issue 28 - Zarbag’s Gitz Issue 29 - Paints Issue 30 - 10 Hobgrot Slittaz Issue 31 - 5 Vigilors Issue 32 - 20 Gloomspite Shootas Issue 33 - Knight-Judicator with Gryph-hounds Issue 34 - Paints Issue 35 - Druanti the Arch-Revenant Issue 36 - Fungoid Cave-Shaman Snazzgar Stinkmullett Issue 37 - Ylthari’s Guardians Issue 38 - 5 Vindictors Issue 39 - Paints Issue 40 - Spirit of Durthu (1 of 2) Issue 41 - Spirit of Durthu (2 of 2) Issue 42 - Mollog’s Mob Issue 43 - 5 Tree-Revenants Issue 44 - Paints and STC Layer Brush Issue 45 - 5 Fanatics.

item.title: Imperium Magazine
item.description:
Peter Bolger’s Content Listing
Status Released Despatched Confirmed Missing Delivery 01 Issue 01 - Warden and Lieutenant Issue 02 - Necron Warriors + Paint Delivery 02 Issue 03 - Assault Intercessors + Paint Issue 04 - Skorpekh Destroyers + Paint Issue 05 - (Exclusive) Primaris Captain Issue 06 - Primaris Aggressors + Paint Delivery 03 Issue 07 - Paints Issue 08 - (Blister) Necron Overlord Issue 09 - Necron Warriors (1 of 2) Issue 10 - Necron Warriors (2 of 2) Delivery 04 Issue 11 - Librarian in Phobos Armour Issue 12 - Paints Issue 13 - Space Marine Assault Intercessors Issue 14 - Munitorum Armoured Container Delivery 05 Issue 15 - Flayed Ones Issue 16 - Space Marine Assault Intercessors Issue 17 - Munitorum Armoured Container Issue 18 - Necron Technomancer Delivery 06 Issue 19 - Munitorum Armoured Container Issue 20 - Paints Issue 21 - Skitarii Rangers (1 of 2) Issue 22 - Skitarii Rangers (2 of 2) Delivery 07 Issue 23 - Canoptek Spyder Issue 24 - Paints Issue 25 - Immortals Issue 26 - Tech-Priest Dominus Delivery 08 Issue 27 - Haemotrope Reactor (1 of 2) Issue 28 - Necron Warriors (1 of 2) Issue 29 - Necron Warriors (2 of 2) Issue 30 - item.title: Mortal Realms
item.description: Issue 01 / Chainrasp Horde and (Dreadfane) Sequitors (and dice) Issue 02 / Myrmourn Banshees, Brush and Paint Issue 03 / Castigators and Gryph-Hound and Paint Issue 04 / Glaivewraith Stalkers and Paint Issue 05 / Xandria Azurebolt Issue 06 / Thorns of the Briar Queen Issue 07 / Paints Issue 08 / Celestar Ballistas Issue 09 / Sequitors and Castigators Issue 10 / Tomb Banshee Issue 11 - Sigmarite Mausoleum (1 of 3) Issue 12 - Knight-Questor Issue 13 / Paints and Drybrush Issue 14 / Dreadblade Harrows Issue 15 - Sigmarite Mausoleum (2 of 3) Issue 16 / Sequitors and Castigators Issue 17 / Dreadscythe Harridans Issue 18 / Paints Issue 19 / Three New Nighthaunt Heroes Issue 20 ; Lord-Arcanum and Evocator-Prime (Soul Wars - Sprue E) Issue 21 / Dreadscythe Harridans Issue 22 / Paints Issue 23 / Liberators and Prosecutor (B Sprue) Issue 24 / Lord-Executioner, Grimghast Reapers, Glaivewraith Stalkers (Soul Wars Sprue) Issue 25 / Paints Issue 26 - Azyrite Ruin Issue 27 / Stormshire’s Cursebreakers Issue 28 / Spirit Hosts Issue 29 / Paints Issue 30 - Azyrite Ruin Issue 31 ; Lord-Exorcist Issue 32 / Citadel Skulls Issue 33 / Paint and Tool Issue 34 - Dominion of Sigmar Statue Issue 35 / Liberators and Prosecutor (B Sprue) Issue 36 - Azyrite Bell Tower Issue 37 - Gryph Hounds and Coelia Greenshade Issue 38 / Crawlocke the Jailor and two Chainghasts Issue 39 / Cairn Wraith Issue 40 - Knight-Azyros Issue 41 ; Stormcast Reinforcements (Age of Sigmar - A Sprue) Issue 42 / Paints and a Brush Issue 43 / Sacrosanct Reinforcements (Soul Wars - A Sprue) Issue 44 / Liekoron the Executioner Issue 45 / Paints Issue 46 - Fallen Sigmar Statue Issue 47 / The Farstriders Issue 48 / Reikenor the Grimhailer Issue 49 / Paints Issue 50 - Sigmarite Ruins Issue 51 - Lord-Ordinator Issue 52 / Chainrasp Horde Issue 53 / Paints Issue 54 - Timeworn Ruin Issue 55 - Lord-Arcanum on Celestial Dracoline Issue 56 / Knight of Shrouds Issue 57 / Hexwraiths Issue 58 / Paints Issue 59 - Evocators on Celestial Dracolines Issue 60 / Bladegheist Revenants (1 of 2) Issue 61 - Sigmarite Altar and Bridges Issue 62 / Citadel Skulls Issue 63 - Space Marine Judicators Issue 64 / Grimghast Reapers Issue 65 / Paints (Refill) Issue 66 - Dominion of Sigmar Statue Issue 67 - Lord-Arcanum Astrea Solbright Issue 68 / Bladegheist Revenants (2 of 2) Issue 69 / Paints Issue 70 / Kurdoss Valentian Issue 71 - Enduring Stormvault (Gryph Hound Statue) Issue 72 / Lady Olynder Issue 73 - Neave Blacktalon Issue 74 - Vanguard Raptors Issue 75 - Mortis Engine (1/3) Issue 76 - Mortis Engine (2/3) Issue 77 - Mortis Engine (3/3) Issue 78 - Mortis Engine & Celestant-Prime Bases Issue 79 - Celestant-Prime (1/2) Issue 80 - Celestant-Prime (2/2) The Mortal Realms is a partwork magazine run by Hatchette for Games Workshop.

item.title: WikiPete7 - Skelecron
Special Miniatures
item.description: This is an (incomplete) listing of the “special” models Games Workshop has released and sold in funky ways. I started compiling it when sopmeone pointed out that I had “missed”1 several Nighthaunt models by only2 painting what was currently for sale.

item.title: YouTube and Special Miniatures
item.description: I made a YouTube video and started a Special Models list.
